TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Utf8JsonReader extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 提供高效能 API，以便對 UTF-8 編碼的 JSON 文字進行唯讀的順向存取。

span.span: Provides a high-performance API for forward-only, read-only access to the UTF-8 encoded JSON text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Utf8JsonReader` 處理程序文字以循序方式使用無快取，並依預設為嚴格遵守[JSON RFC](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8259)。`Utf8JsonReader` processes the text sequentially with no caching and by default adheres strictly to the [JSON RFC](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8259). 當`Utf8JsonReader`遇到無效的 JSON，就會擲回該行的基本錯誤資訊行數和位元組位置等。When `Utf8JsonReader` encounters invalid JSON, it throws a with basic error information like line number and byte position on the line. 因為此類型為 ref struct，它並不直接支援非同步處理。Since this type is a ref struct, it doesn't directly support async. 不過，它提供以讀取不完整的資料，並繼續閱讀之後會顯示更多資料, 的重新進入的支援。However, it does provide support for reentrancy to read incomplete data and to continue reading once more data is presented. 若要能夠讀取時的最大深度設定或允許略過註解，請建立的執行個體並將它傳遞至讀取器。To be able to set max depth while reading OR allow skipping comments, create an instance of and pass it to the reader.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為此類型為 ref struct，它是僅限堆疊的類型，和 ref 結構的所有限制會都套用至它。Since this type is a ref struct, it is a stack-only type, and all the limitations of ref structs apply to it. 這是為什麼建構函式可接受的原因。This is the reason why the constructor accepts a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CurrentDepth`屬性會追蹤的遞迴深度的巢狀的物件 / 陣列為止所處理的 JSON 文字中。The `CurrentDepth` property tracks the recursive depth of the nested objects / arrays within the JSON text processed so far.

summary.span: 取得 狀態的目前快照集，該狀態必須由呼叫端擷取，並傳回至具有更多資料的 建構函式。

span.span: Gets the current snapshot of the state that must be captured by the caller and passed back in to the constructor with more data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於，這是 ref struct、 狀態時仍可存留跨 async/await 界限，並且因此這種類型，才可提供更多資料的新執行個體繼續之前，以非同步方式讀取支援。Unlike the , which is a ref struct, the state can survive across async/await boundaries, and hence this type is required to provide support for reading in more data asynchronously before continuing with a new instance of the .

從來源讀取下一個 JSON 權杖值，未經逸出並轉碼為 。Reads the next JSON token value from the source, unescaped, and transcoded as a . 剖析為 的權杖值。The token value parsed to a . To be added. JSON 權杖值不是字串 (亦即，不是 或 )。The JSON token value isn't a string (that is, not a or ).

The JSON string contains invalid UTF-8 bytes or invalid UTF-16 surrogates.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasValueSequence As Boolean
public: property bool HasValueSequence { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示要用來取得權杖值的 Value 屬性。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates which Value property to use to get the token value.

value.span: 如果應該用來取得語彙基元的值。

span.span: if should be used to get the token value.
if should be used instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`HasValueSequence`已`false`，是空的。If `HasValueSequence` is `false`, is empty. 因此，使用讀取的語彙基元值屬性。Therefore, read the token value using the property. 中的輸入資料`ReadOnlySpan`，這一律會傳回`false`。For input data within a `ReadOnlySpan`, this always returns `false`. 中的輸入資料`ReadOnlySequence`，這只會傳回`true`如果語彙基元值 information officer 個以上的單一區段，因此無法代表範圍。For input data within a `ReadOnlySequence`, this only returns `true` if the token value straddles more than a single segment and hence can't be represented as a span.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ValueSequence As ReadOnlySequence(Of Byte)

summary.span: 取得上次處理的權杖，作為輸入承載的 ReadOnlySpan<位元組> 的配量。

span.span: Gets the value of the last processed token as a ReadOnlySpan<byte> slice of the input payload.

summary.span: 如果在 ReadOnlySequence<byte> 內提供 JSON，且表示權杖值的配量可融入單一區段，則 包含配量值，因為它可以表示為範圍。

span.span: If the JSON is provided within a ReadOnlySequence<byte> and the slice that represents the token value fits in a single segment, then contains the sliced value since it can be represented as a span.

summary.span: 否則， 包含權杖值。

span.span: Otherwise, contains the token value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已`false`，`ValueSequence`是空的。If is `false`, `ValueSequence` is empty. 因此，只能存取`ValueSequence`如果是`true`。Therefore, only access `ValueSequence` if is `true`. 否則，必須存取語彙基元的值從。Otherwise, the token value must be accessed from .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ValueSpan As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte)
public: property ReadOnlySpan<System::Byte> ValueSpan { ReadOnlySpan<System::Byte> get(); };

summary.span: 取得上次處理的權杖，作為輸入承載的 ReadOnlySpan<位元組> 的配量。

span.span: Gets the value of the last processed token as a ReadOnlySpan<byte> slice of the input payload.

summary.span: 如果在 ReadOnlySequence<位元組> 內提供 JSON，且表示權杖值的配量可融入單一區段，則 包含配量值，因為它可以表示為範圍。

span.span: If the JSON is provided within a ReadOnlySequence<byte> and the slice that represents the token value fits in a single segment, then contains the sliced value since it can be represented as a span.

summary.span: 否則， 包含權杖值。

span.span: Otherwise, the contains the token value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已`true`，是空的。If is `true`, is empty. 因此，只能存取`ValueSpan`如果是`false`。Therefore, only access `ValueSpan` if is `false`. 否則，必須存取語彙基元的值從。Otherwise, the token value must be accessed from .
